title: What I Want for Christmas
description: It's Christmas, the first Zane and Dakota spend together. As they navigate the tricky waters of new feelings and old fears, they will find out what they want most.  *Warning: this book contains a whole lot of graphic sex. Mature readers only. Not intended for young readers.*  Author note: This is a very short story taking place after the events in ZANE.
author: Jo Raven
